title: M Code Laser Reference
description: M-Code Listing for Laser Machine Tools

M03.desc: M03: Wait for moves to complete, then set the spindle speed (clockwise) or laser power (full if unspecified).

P.shortDesc: Percentage of spindle speed or laser power 0-100

M04.desc: M04: Wait for moves to complete, then set the spindle speed (counter-clockwise) or laser power (full if unspecified).

P.shortDesc: Percentage of spindle speed or laser power 0-100

M1010.desc: M1010: Enclosure module status query and control.

S.desc:
S: control code
S0: Disabled door opening trigger
S1: Enabled door opening trigger
S3: Set light power. M1010 S3 P[0 - 100]
S4: Set fan power. M1010 S4 P[0 - 100]
S12: Refresh door Status

M1011.desc: M1011: Air purifier status query and control.

F.desc:
F: control code
F0: Turn off the purifier.
S1: Enabled door opening trigger
S3: Set light power. M1010 S3 P[0 - 100]
S4: Set fan power. M1010 S4 P[0 - 100]
S12: Refresh door Status

S1.shortDesc: Force power up and run in specified F gear speed
